column1: Uchi////There's really nothing negative you can say about Uchi
column2: except for the fact that it's difficult to get a table.  The place looks fantastic
column4: the sake menu is the best I've ever seen outside of Japan or California
column7: for lack of a better word
column8: perfect.  This was the best sushi I have had since I left San Francisco
column9: and is a must-visit location for sushi lovers here in Houston.
